message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product which has been valued at $12,000 to you. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I believe it would greatly benefit your needs. I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $10,000. This is an exclusive offer tailored to recognize your interest and commitment. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.
